metadata.name: VZORKOVNA #1
metadata.description: The first and most important nft for me from the calligraffiti collection. This art object is located in one of the popular bars in Vzorkovna, Prague. This was my first order for the painting of the wall and I had a lot of experience and fun in the process of creating this art object. If you are in Prague I highly recommend to visit Vzorkovna bar and see the wall in real life
